title: 【やさしい日本語】福岡(ふくおか)の 大学(だいがく)が、 ウクライナの 学生(がくせい)を 呼(よ)んで 勉強(べんきょう)してもらう
cleaned_sentences: Students from Ukraine and Japan Russia is attacking next door Ukraine.
Many people have died or fled to other countries.
Nihon Keizai University in Dazaifu City, Fukuoka Prefecture has been friends with Ukrainian universities for some time.
So I will help Ukrainian students.
We invite 70 people who were studying Japanese at the Kiev National Language University to study.
I'll be asked to live in a university dormitory.
I plan to have them study for free and provide them with as much money as possible for their daily lives.
It seems that this is the first time a Japanese university has helped a Ukrainian university student like this.
◆◆ Kyushu prefectures and cities are also preparing to help those who run away from Ukraine.
Fukuoka and Saga prefectures plan to prepare houses.
The original article is here Easy Japanese We deliver news translated into "easy Japanese" that is easy for foreigners and children to understand.
